resources.string:
Dialify lets you put contacts into your notification bar, where you can call or text them instantly.
 
Simply select a contact to begin.
 
If you edit your contacts after creating notifications, just run Dialify again to reset them.
 
~ Dialify ~
 
Created by Eric Williams 
eric.c.williams@gmail.com
 
Dedicated with love to Ian and Liliana.

It looks like you have no contacts.

That makes me a sad panda.

:'-(
Sorry, but that would put you over the limit of 10 notifications. Please delete some if you\'d like to create more.
You currently have 10 notifications, which is the maximum allowed. Please delete some if you\'d like to create more.
What notification(s) would you like for this contact?
